h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai
content: With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai'.
The content is as follows:
With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!
